senses.sense_definition: Действительное причастие прошедшего времени от глагола <w>шабашить</w>.

examples.text: Сосед, <шабашивший> всё лето на строительстве дач, смог купить себе новый автомобиль.

target_lang_translations.en: The neighbor, who had been <moonlighting> all summer building dachas, was able to buy himself a new car.

examples.text: Бригада строителей, <шабашившая> в нашем посёлке, закончила работу раньше срока.

target_lang_translations.en: The brigade of builders <doing side jobs> in our village finished the work ahead of schedule.

target_lang_definitions.en: Past active participle of the verb 'шабашить', referring to someone who was working on the side, moonlighting, or doing unofficial odd jobs.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: working a second job or doing side work, often unofficially
performing temporary or informal work for extra money
earning income outside of regular employment
